text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Illumine's, yellow.
L'Antica's... purple...
Houkura's, orange.
ALSTROEMERIA's... pink!
Straylight's... red...
Noctchill's cyan...
SHHis's green...
CoMETIK's, black...!
What if we put them all together?

283PRO bouquetâ˜† / 283PRO, bouquet...! /
283PRO bouquet~

Where should we put it~?
Maybe at the entrance~? Or in the living room~?

Since it's a place everyone passes by,
maybe the entrance would be good?

Yeah...
Tenka also agrees...

Hehe, then let's ask Producer-san
if it's okay to place it there!

I can't wait for it to start~
The live.

Hehe...
I'm looking forward to everyone's performances...!

I hope the fans,
will be pleased too.

If that happens, the audience..
will bloom beautifully like flowers.

Wow, Chiyuki-san!
That analogy is so lovely~!

Yeah...!
Tenka kind of understand it...

Tenka also feels like... sometimes, beyond the stage...
it's like a flower garden....
Indeed... now that you mention it, it does seem so!

For each song's image and each unit's color,
they show various expressions.
A flower garden shining beautifully and brightly!
Hehe... right?

Even with the same song, the same unit,
the colors never turn out exactly the same...

It becomes a once-in-a-lifetime scenery,
turning into precious memories... It's wonderful, isn't it?
Hehe... yeah...

Tenka wonder what colors...
we'll see at the next live...
We're looking forward to it already, aren't we~?
Yeah.

It would be nice if it turned into a
colorful flower garden like this bouquet.

...
Is the water... a bit... low?

It seems like having too much isn't good,
so this amount should be fine, right?

Good morning,
Amana-chan, Tenka-chan.
Good morning! / Good morning...

Hehe...
you're blooming beautifully today too.

Yeah... it seems like everyone is changing the water
... or something like that...

Hehe, maybe the flowers are feeling energetic
from all the attention!

Flowers-san, please watch over the live and
make it a success~
